The show then proceeds to follow the ups and downs of their \"fake relationship\" which eventually blossoms into a real relationship, but not without the usual problems of jealousy and insecurities that come with dating.\n\n2gether is an adaptation of JittiRain's Phro Rao Khu Kan novel series."},"links":{"al":"125117","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B09MD7JNX6?binding=kindle_edition\u0026ref_=dbs_s_ks_series_rwt_tkin\u0026qid=1736026933\u0026sr=1-4","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/638569/","mal":"136689","mu":"mdvnja5"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f42fbf9e-188a-447b-9fdc-f19dc1e4d685","name":{"en":"Music"}}]}

It seems they were hired to test his abilities, but unfortunately he doesn't have any of his special powers on this day, so they beat him up until his friends come to help him.\n\nAlmost more mysterious than his occasional powers is the truth about the gang of bullies...who were hired by his estranged older brother."},"links":{"mal":"11757","mu":"otjbzzr"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

She stared at the man who’s eyes burned with an intense fire. His expression was grim and unrelenting.\n\n“It’s true, is it not? Jumping from one man to another, you’re insane…”\n“What’s wrong with me meeting with potential partners? I’m marriageable age, after all.”\n\nAn bit her lip, while Lennox slowly parted his.\n\n“…What’s the problem?”\n“What do you mean?”\n\nHearing her question, Lennox’s eyelashes trembled slightly. His claw-like hands clamped down on her, pressing her against the wall. An let out a cry and closed her eyes. But fortunately, his hand cradled the back of her head, shielding her from the wall. Trembling, she glared at him.\n\n“You said you didn’t like me.”\n“I-I don’t know what you’re talking about.”\n\nAn blinked in confusion. It was clear he was referring to that particular incident. This man dug into her unwanted memories, her breath hitching as red crept upon her face.
